items.name: Cars
items.description: These stylish vehicles are not only a status symbol but also a favorite among car enthusiasts.
items.howToUse: Display it in your garage or profile.
items.howToAccess: Available with an exclusive pass or by purchasing it in the store.

items.name: Structure
items.description: A versatile residential property that enhances your net worth. Ideal as a living space or a valuable asset.
items.howToUse: Utilize this property as your home or as an investment asset.
items.howToAccess: Available through purchase or by using an exclusive pass.

items.name: Rings
items.description: An elegant jewellery ring that symbolizes love and commitment. Perfect for sharing with your spouse and showcasing on your marriage profile, while also contributing to your net worth.
items.howToUse: Wear it or gift it to your spouse to highlight your marital bond.
items.howToAccess: Available for purchase or via an exclusive membership pass.

items.name: Watches
items.description: A premium timepiece that showcases sophistication and adds to your net worth. A symbol of style, success, and wealth.
items.howToUse: Wear it to enhance your style and status.
items.howToAccess: Available for purchase or through an exclusive pass.

items.name: Roses
items.description: A delightful single rose that enhances relationships. Sharing with your spouse increases your bondXP, while sharing with others is also encouraged.
items.howToUse: Gift to your spouse for a bondXP boost, or share with friends and family.
items.howToAccess: Available for purchase, through daily rewards, or as a reward during special events.
